document_data.name: Archenwood Stout
document_data.mainbody: '''Archenwood stout''' was a lager brewed in [[Archendale]] from well-roasted [[wheat]] and [[rye]] in the later half of 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was offered in the tavern of [[The Black Horse]] inn within [[Archenbridge]].
document_data.Prices:
Archenwood stout could be purchased in the following containers:
* Draft (5 [[cp]])

[[The Black Horse]] inn in Archenbridge had the stout on its menu. [[Essembra]]'s [[The Silver Taproom]] offered a variety of local libations, including Archenwood stout.
